description: Even without imposing a total lockdown, Turkey seems to have handled the outbreak well.
title: Coronavirus: How Turkey took control of Covid-19 emergency
title_page: Coronavirus: How Turkey took control of Covid-19 emergency - BBC News
maintext: Chief doctor Nurettin Yiyit - whose art work is on the hospital walls - says it's key to use hydroxychloroquine early. "Other countries are using this drug too late," he says, "especially the United States. We only use it at the beginning. We have no hesitation about this drug. We believe it's effective because we get the results."
